query:
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(orderDate, '%Y-%m') as mes,
  COUNT(*) as total_pedidos
FROM orders
WHERE orderDate >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH)
GROUP BY mes
ORDER BY mes
